public ref class DataObjectPastingEventArgs sealed : System::Windows::DataObjectEventArgs

span.span: Contains arguments for the .
event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 貼上作業已選取，貼上的資料格式時，但實際上貼上資料之前，就會發生事件。The event occurs when a paste operation has selected a data format to paste as, but before the data is actually pasted.

summary.span: 取得或設定要用於貼上作業的建議 。

span.span: Gets or sets a suggested to use for the paste operation.

value.span: 要用於貼上作業的目前建議 。

span.span: The currently suggested to use for the paste operation.

value.span: 取得這個值會傳回用於貼上作業的目前建議 。

span.span: Getting this value returns the currently suggested for the paste operation.

value.span: 設定這個值會指定要用於貼上作業的新建議 。

span.span: Setting this value specifies a new suggested to use for the paste operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會包含最初這是儲存在與相同屬性。Initially this property contains a that is identical to that stored in the property. 貼上的事件處理常式的自訂可以指定新建議貼上設定這個屬性。Custom pasting event handlers can specify a new suggested to paste by setting this property. A儲存在這個屬性必須有至少一個資料格式，其中第一個會自動套用到時設定這個屬性的屬性。A stored in this property must have at least one data format, the first of which is automatically applied to the property when this property is set.

exception.span: 當嘗試將這個屬性設定為 **null** 時，就會引發。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to **null**.

exception.span: 當嘗試將這個屬性設定為不包含任何資料格式的資料物件時，就會引發。

span.span: Raised when an attempt is made to set this property to a data object that contains no data formats.
